title: Direct solution of the hard pomeron problem for arbitrary conformal weight
abstract: A new method is applied to solve the Baxter equation for the one dimensional system of noncompact spins. Dynamics of such an ensemble is equivalent to that of a set of reggeized gluons exchanged in the high energy limit of QCD amplitudes. The technique offers more insight into the old calculation of the intercept of hard Pomeron, and provides new results in the odderon channel.
